name: Jayson Boubin
content: Jayson Boubin - Our Faculty | School of Computing | Binghamton University Skip to main content School of Computing Our Faculty Jayson Boubin Assistant Professor School of Computing jboubin@binghamton.edu 607-777-4835 EB N32 BackgroundJayson Boubin joined the School of Computing as an assistant professor in August 2022. He researches autonomous systems and their applications in domains like agriculture, natural disaster prevention and infrastructure inspection. His work focuses on both the design nuances and implementation difficulties of real-world autonomous systems, particularly autonomous drones, and the machine learning models and computer systems that support them. He received his PhD from Ohio State University.
